name: playwright-workshop-101
description: In this Learn lab, you'll learn how to use the Playwright open-source test automation framework for building an end-to-end test specification for a sample application.   - We'll be using a _modified version_ of the [TasteJS TODO MVC application](https://github.com/tastejs/todomvc)  - Our version reflects [this Playwright demo](https://demo.playwright.dev/todomvc) that's used as an example.
